name: Outlook.com - No Ads or MSN Links
description: Simplifies the new Outlook.com email page by removing the links to the msn network at the top of the page (Above header) and removing advertisements.
additional_info:
Updates:
1.2 (14/10/12)
Grey sidebar continuing to appear on different reading pane layouts - Bug resolved.

1.1 (29/09/12)
Fixed up bug where email background was still displaying the grey sidebar.

1.0 (01/06/12)
Removed advertisements and grey sidebar from display.

discussions.name: Works as advertised! A bugfix request...
